actions.committee: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

official_title: A bill to amend the provisions of law establishing a fund to promote the free flow of domestically produced fishing products in order to increase the amounts in such fund.

summary.text: Increases from thirty to one hundred the percentage of gross receipts from duties collected under the customs laws on fishery products in order to promote the free flow of domestically produced fishery products in commerce.

titles.title: A bill to amend the provisions of law establishing a fund to promote the free flow of domestically produced fishing products in order to increase the amounts in such fund.
